#summary Contact Me

=Contact Me=

Bug reports and feature requests can be made by opening a ticket on Potato's [http://www.potatomushclient.com/support Issue Tracker] - please check for a similar issue first! You can also email me (Mike Griffiths) directly at mike-at-keyboardzombie-dot-com. All contributions will be fully credited.

If you're reporting a bug, please include the version of Potato, your operating system, and anything else you think is relevant - the information displayed in Help → About → Show Package Info is generally useful.

Potato is completely free, but if you've found it useful and would like to make a donation towards its development, you can do so at [http://www.potatomushclient.com/contact/donate www.potatomushclient.com]. (Thank you!)
